lines.text: [Carl is walking past inmates on his way out of prison]
Keep the faith, brothers! I'll look up on your wives and girlfriends and let 'em know you miss 'em!
Oh yeah, you're smart! You failed every fucking class! You were in remedial everything! You flunked fucking gym!
Remember, trust in the spirits. They're everywhere!
This is ridiculous. I can't just pack up and leave, go to Austria or wherever.
Why not? What the hell is stopping me?
